Nerangs.ab: yasnəmca vaɱəmca aojasca zuuarəca āfrīnāmī ka xšnūman srōš bēd aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan ka xšnūman dudīgar sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe tā āhūiriiehe pas aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan

"(They should recite): yasnəmca vaɱəmca aojasca zuuarəca āfrīnāmī. When it is the šnūman for Srōš, they should recite three aṣ̌əm vohū. If it is another šnūman, they should recite sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe until āhūiriiehe and then three aṣ̌əm vohū."
yasnəmca vaɱəmca aojasca zuuarəca āfrīnāmī ka xšnūman srōš bēd aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan sraōšahe nē abāyēd guftan čīyōn xšnūman dudīgar bēd sraōšahe tā āhūiriiehe bē abāyēd guftan

"(After) yasnəmca vaɱəmca aojasca zuuarəca āfrīnāmī, when it is the šnūman for Srōš, he should recite three aṣ̌əm vohū and he must not recite sraōšahe. When it is another šnūman, he must recite sraōšahe until āhūiriiehe."
